cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.CL, cs.CR 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the practicality of using Answer Set Programming (ASP) for representing logical formalisms, specifically for capturing causal explanations from causal information. This falls under the category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) as it deals with knowledge representation and reasoning. Additionally, the paper discusses recent improvements in working ASP systems, which could fall under the category of Logic in Computer Science (cs.LO) or Programming Languages (cs.PL). The implementation aspect of the paper could also make it relevant to Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) or Cryptography and Security (cs.CR).
